definitions.definition: A southern supercontinent , formed before Pangaea between 600 and 530 million years ago, that included most of the landmasses which make up today's continents of the Southern Hemisphere .

secondary_definitions: ( geology ) A southern supercontinent , formed before Pangaea between 600 and 530 million years ago, that included most of the landmasses which make up today's continents of the Southern Hemisphere .
